text: Haqeeqat yeh hai ke mahino ki tadaad jab se Allah ne aasmaan o zameen ko paida kiya hai Allah ke nawishte (record) mein bara (twelve) hi hai, aur inmein se chaar mahine haraam hain. Yahi theek zaabta hai lihaza in chaar (four) mahino mein apne upar zulm na karo aur mushrikon se sab milkar lado (fight) jis tarah woh sab milkar tumse ladte hain aur jaan rakkho ke Allah muttaqiyon hi ke saath hai
